checkUpkeep(bytes).details: Part of the Chainlink automation interface.

returns.performData: Encoded data on what action to perform during upkeep.
returns.upkeepNeeded: Boolean flag indicating if upkeep is needed.

performUpkeep(bytes).details: Part of the Chainlink automation interface.

params.performData: Encoded data indicating the actions to perform.

checkUpkeep(bytes).notice: Checks if upkeep is needed based on TSL conditions.COMPUTED OFF-CHAIN

performUpkeep(bytes).notice: Performs the upkeep of updating the stop loss threshold or triggering a sell.
